from frommle2.core.xforward import ForwardOpBase
import xarray as xr
import numpy as np

[26]:

# create a forward function which maps polynomial coordinates to values

# f(x) = a0+ a1 (x-x0) + ... an (x -x0)^n

class PolyFrwd(ForwardOpBase):
    def __init__(self,outcoords,npoly,ref=0.0):
        self.npoly=npoly
        self.ref=ref
        #create a multiindex which are the input coordinates expanded in terms of polynomial coefficients
        incoords=pd.MultiIndex.from_product([outcoords,[i for i in range(self.npoly+1)]],names=["var","poly"])
        # self.A=np.array([incoord**n for n in range(2)])
        super().__init__(incoords,outcoords)
    def __call__(self,dsin):
        #grab the coordinate variable of the input

        # dx=dsin[self.incoords]-self.ref
        return dx

pforw=PolyFrwd(coord,n)
